entry.title: Why can't we be friends: do corporations and FOSS really mix?
entry.summary:
Description

Speakers: Lynn Root, Noa Resare

Many folks in the Python community appreciate and contribute to Free and Open Source Software. But sometimes, your employer may not be on your side. We will present the current problem space that both community members and companies have for using and supporting FOSS. We will then walk you through arguments and solutions to help increase your company's engagement with the community.

Slides can be found at: https://speakerdeck.com/pycon2016 and https://github.com/PyCon/2016-slides
